entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
